divs: Sighting DetailsI'm at home at 111 N. Jefferson St.,Slater,Mo. and can see the changing shapes of lights in the sky around Slater,Mo. Small lights fly into larger lights hanging in the sky. Small lights fly straight lines,jerky lines,swirling lines,shooting off and coming back,taking different shapes and flying from one large "light" to another large "light".
